com.github.maven.plugins.site

Class SiteMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.github.maven.plugins.core.GitHubProjectMojo
        • com.github.maven.plugins.site.SiteMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class SiteMojo
extends com.github.maven.plugins.core.GitHubProjectMojo
    Mojo which copies files to a GitHub repository branch. This directly uses the GitHub data API to upload blobs, make commits, and update references and so a local Git repository is not used.
    Author:
    Kevin Sawicki (kevin@github.com)
